Posted By: Kryptnyt (3/7/2011 1:07:38 AM)

posts.post_content: After your left or right hand is chosen as a target you can always cut it off, so the target becomes illegal and the enchantment gets countered and goes to the graveyard. (You can do physical actions as a response to spells and abilities).
posts.html:
